items.summary: Update the app-level preloader gating so the existing animated preloader displays on every fresh app open/load, but never on internal route/page changes within the SPA.
Preserve the current preloader animation timing and visuals exactly as implemented in FirstLaunchPreloader, including the Z → I → Z → O reveal sequence and fade-out behavior.
Remove or replace the current persistent 'first launch only' localStorage behavior (key: 'app-first-launch-complete') so it no longer prevents the preloader from showing on subsequent app opens.
